text: Luigi Di Bartolomeo (7 January 1943 â€“ 18 February 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of Christian Democracy and then Forza Italia. Di Bartolomeo was born in Campobasso, Italy. He was President of Molise from 1992 until 1993. He later was a Senator from 2006 until 2008. Di Bartolomeo was Mayor of Campobasso from 2009 until 2014. Di Bartolomeo died on 18 February 2022 in Campobasso at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Molise Category:Province of Campobasso
title: Luigi Di Bartolomeo
